decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): Supporting Document "Quotation" dated 01/09/2023, Supporting Document "OptiVision LED GEN3.5", Supporting Document "Philips OptiVision LED gen3.5 floodlighting system", Supporting Document "OptiVision LED floodlighting: Understanding our Louvres" August 2021, Supporting Document "St Columba's Lawn Tennis Club - CalculuX Area 7.9.0.0" dated 31.08.3023, Dwg. No. SCTC S1, Dwg. No. SCTC S2.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 185596FUL dated 25.01.2019 for "Installation of sixteen floodlight lamps on nine support columns (max. 8.0m high)". Amendment seeks to install 8 No. 827 watt Philips OptiVision BVP518 Gen 3.5 LED floodlight luminaires in lieu of the remaining 8 no. Philips OptiVision MVP507 Luminaires
